excerpt.rendered:
This tender boat based on the well-known Bullit 600. The aluminum boat is 6.00m long and 2.15m wide. The draft is 0.40m and the vertical clearance 1.12m. The hull weight is 600kg.

A large number of fire brigades use a boat made by Alumax Boats. The freedom from maintenance, robustness and excellent sailing characteristics make the fire boat very suitable for professional use. Also the unlimited possibilities to expand with a fire extinguisher, navigation equipment, telephony, etc, make many fire brigades choose the Bullit 600.

View the other Bullit workboats here >>
